members.name: dofile
members.description: Opens the named file and executes its contents as a chunk.

members.name: class
members.description: Creates a new class object.

members.name: print
members.description: Prints data to the console.

members.name: type
members.description: Returns the type of an object as a string.

members.name: version
members.description: Returns the current version of the game.

members.name: isHost
members.description: Returns whether the game is running on the host.

members.name: isServerHost
members.description: Returns whether the script is running in server mode.

members.name: exists
members.description: Returns whether an object exists in the game.

members.name: raycast
members.description: Performs a ray cast between two positions.

members.name: distanceRaycast
members.description: Performs a distance ray cast from a position with a given direction.

members.name: applyImpluse
members.description: Applies an impulse to a shape, changing its velocity immediately.

members.name: applyTorque
members.description: Applies a torque impulse to a body, changing its angular velocity immediately.

members.name: explode
members.description: Creates an explosion at given position.

members.name: setGravity
members.description: Sets the gravitational acceleration affecting shapes and bodies.

members.name: getGravity
members.description: Returns the gravitational acceleration affecting shapes and bodies.

members.name: types
members.description: Upon a raycast or collision detection, these types are used to find out what object was intersected.

members.name: getPosition
members.description: Returns the world postition of the camera.

members.name: getDirection
members.description: Returns the direction the camera is aiming.

members.name: getUp
members.description: Returns the up-vector perpendicular to the camera's aim.

members.name: getRight
members.description: Returns the right-vector perpendicular to the camera's aim.

members.name: getFov
members.description: Returns the camera's field of view angle.

members.name: setShake
members.description: Sets the camera's level of camera shake.

members.name: setShake
members.description: Plays a sound.

members.name: soundList
members.description: A table of available sounds in the game.
